name: Witchual
description:
A tower defence prototype was produced in 32 hours over a week in 2021. 

Theme: Ritual

Controls

W/A/S/D = Move Minion around the scene

Arrow Keys  = Move the camera around the scene

Mouse = Move the camera around in the scene (only by the edges)

1/2/3/4, then left click = Add towers

5, then left click = Sell a tower

Q/E, then left click = Cast a spell

F = Centre camera and lock to the minion

R = Summon the rock demon

Z = Spawn wave

M = Show map

P = Go back to menu

O = Restart

Scroll Wheel = Zoom in and out

4-3 Aspect Ratio Team Programmers:

Michael Jordan

Rachael Colaco

William de Beer

Artists:
